channel.description: Chapter 19 \ The Linux Firewall \ ::: {style=“border-style: double; border-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); border-top-width: 1px; width: 0.375;”} ::: \ This chapter describes the following major topics: \ Describe Linux firewall for host-based security control \ Overview of the firewalld service \ Understand the concepts of firewalld zones and services \ Analyze zone and service configuration files \ Control access to network services and ports through firewalld \ Use firewall-cmd command to manage firewall rules
